contents:
我用Contact White House給川普發信了，順便幫連登仔的也發過去了，他們那個曾偉雄的問題應該很嚴重...

Hi, Mr. President

Firstly, my apology for not using my real name, I am sure you will understand after you read my message.
I have created a petition 2 days ago, but I found the number of signature seems not changed since 24 Aug, I have shared the link with a lot of friends, and I got feedback said none of them received the confirmation email.
Moreover, I found that I am not the only one facing this issue, I have been told another petition created by Hong Kong protester is facing the same situation. I know you are the busiest man in the world, I will be very grateful if you can send someone to check the issue. I hope this is not a cyber attack, because I recall the web site was in a status of "Site Unavailable" for few hours on 24 Aug.

Here is the link of my petition:
https://petitions.whitehouse.gov/petition/demand-chinese-government-remove-great-firewall-restriction

And here is the link of another petition in same situation that I mentioned:
https://petitions.whitehouse.gov/petition/we-demand-rejection-andy-tsangs-nomination-united-nations-positions

Thank you very much for your time.
Don

有回復我會放上來。
